messages.subject: Re: need some help
messages.msgSnippet: Melanie, I am sure others on this list will have some great sites for you ( I look forward to seeing them myself) I have a personal favorite that you may find
messages.messageBody:
Melanie,
I am sure others on this list will have some great sites for you ( I
look forward to seeing them myself) I have a personal favorite that you
may find useful. It is an essay by Marnie Ko called Life is an
Education. find it at
http://www.midnightbeach.com/hs/Life_is_an_education.html
I hope I got that link right, I will double check it in a bit and repost
if it is wrong. Best wishes to you in your endeavor to show your husband
the many benifits of home education/unschooling.

Mary in Idaho
